ballot_measures.title: Amendment 1
ballot_measures.description: Renew the existing sales and use tax of 0.1% for 10 years to fund state parks and soil and water conservation. This legislative referendum is on the Missouri 2026 ballot.

ballot_measures.title: Amendment 2
ballot_measures.description: Require the Jackson County Assessor to be an elected position. This legislatively referred constitutional amendment is on the Missouri 2026 ballot.

ballot_measures.title: Amendment 3
ballot_measures.description: Prohibit abortion in most cases, and prohibit gender transition procedures for minors under eighteen. This legislatively referred constitutional amendment is on the Missouri 2026 ballot.

ballot_measures.title: Amendment 4
ballot_measures.description: Require the majority of voters from each congressional district to approve initiative petitions to amend the constitution, prohibit foreign nationals from contributing to ballot measure campaigns, among other provisions. This legislatively referred constitutional amendment is on the Missouri 2026 ballot.
